getAllhomeworkSql: select homeworkId, description, deadline, groupId, teacherId from homework
gethomeworkSql: select homeworkId, description, deadline, groupId, teacherId from homework
inserthomeworkSql: insert into homework ( description, deadline, groupId, teacherId)
updatehomeworkSql: update homework set description=?, deadline=?, teacherId=?
getAllstudentHomeworkSql: SELECT * FROM homework INNER JOIN student ON homework.groupId = student.groupId
